data.title: Zwickau climate: Weather Zwickau & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Zwickau

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Zwickau

>>average temperature by month Zwickau

>>Weather Zwickau

Zwickau's climate is classified as warm and temperate. There is significant rainfall throughout the year in Zwickau. Even the driest month still has a lot of rainfall. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification is Cfb. The temperature in this location is approximately 9.1 °C | 48.4 °F, as determined by statistical analysis. In a year, the rainfall is 903 mm | 35.6 inch.

Zwickau are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Zwickau

The least amount of rainfall occurs in February. The average in this month is 58 mm | 2.3 inch. Most precipitation falls in July, with an average of 99 mm | 3.9 inch.

average temperature by month Zwickau

The temperatures are highest on average in July, at around 18.4 °C | 65.2 °F. In January, the average temperature is -0.3 °C | 31.5 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

Weather by month // weather averages Zwickau

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The variation in the precipitation between the driest and wettest months is 41 mm | 2 inch. The average temperatures vary during the year by 18.7 °C | 33.7 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (84.44 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is August (68.55 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is January (14.47 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is October (11.27 days).

Zwickau weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Zwickau

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Zwickau, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 10.62 hours of sunshine. In total there are 329.16 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month with the fewest daily hours of sunshine in Zwickau is January with an average of 3.13 hours of sunshine a day. In total there are 97.07 hours of sunshine in January.

Around 2446.21 hours of sunshine are counted in Zwickau throughout the year. On average there are 80.26 hours of sunshine per month.

Airport close to Zwickau

The closest Airports of Zwickau are: Leipzig/Halle Airport (LEJ) 80.33km,Dresden Airport (DRS) 99.93km,Erfurt-Weimar Airport (ERF) 111.31km

You can reach Zwickau from this Cities by Plane: London (LCY), Paris (CDG), Cologne (CGN), Bremen (BRE), Funchal (FNC), Hurghada (HRG), Basel (BSL), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Agadir (AGA), Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFS), Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (LPA), Heraklion (HER), Barcelona (BCN), Zurich (ZRH), Düsseldorf (DUS), Amsterdam (AMS), Palma de Mallorca (PMI), Antalya (AYT), Stuttgart (STR), Moscow (DME)
